text: hi guys I'm Laura Vitale and on this
episode of Laura in the kitchen it is
fall time so I wanted to share with you
my latest favorite specialty drink if
you want to treat or if maybe you're
having a party a fall party and you want
to consider to drink then this pumpkin
spice white hot chocolate is a drink for
you now we love this for special
occasions like I said it's definitely a
treat it's very rich it's not something
that you can pick up and drink every
morning although you could if you want
to your life you do you but I wanted to
share with you because it's easy it's
simple doesn't require a lot of
ingredients and it's so perfect if you
want to like multiply this recipe and
put it in the crock-pot or your slow
cooker and serve it at a party it is
such a hit and it's not out of this
world so let me run you through a list
of ingredients very short and sweet but
hey I like that heavy cream whole milk
really good white chocolate chips you
need pure pumpkin puree a little bit of
granulated sugar pumpkin pie spice and
some good vanilla extract that is it
you can spike this with a little booze
if you want to I'm not going to because
like I said I'd like to be able to serve
it to everybody kids adults whatever
whoever comes around I want to give them
some of this because it's so good
alright let's get started in a sauce pan
